Fales Library and Special Collections
Fales Library Poster Collection
Fales Library
Rhein, Eric
Sandlin, David, 1956-
Tambellini, Aldo
MSS.586
3 Linear Feet in 1 flat-file folder
1998, 2004, 2010, undated This collection was assembled by Special Collections staff from individual posters donated to the libary. Posters in this collection include artwork and promotions for publications, exhibitions, and educational programs, many of which focus on art, music, film, and theater in New York City. Materials date from 1968 to 2010. Materials are mostly in English and a few in German.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Materials gifted from various donors, 2017-2019. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.049.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are listed in the order in which they were received from the donors.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Fales Poster Collection; MSS 586; box number; folder number or item identifier; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Processing Information
Materials were unrolled and placed in a new acid-free flat-file folder.
Scope and Contents
This collection was assembled by Special Collections staff from individual posters donated to the library. Posters in this collection include artwork as well as promotions for publications, exhibitions, and educational programs, many of which focus on art, music, film, and theater in New York City. Materials date from 1968 to 2010.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
